nodes.bodyText: I think this needs to be in ForwardingClientCall or friend. This is not part of ClientCall itself.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -141,6 +141,11 @@ public void onMessage(T message) {} * An additional block of trailer metadata may be received at the end of the call from the * server. An empty {@link Metadata} object is passed if no trailers are received. * + *

If uncaught exception is thrown in `onClose`, gRPC will fail to notify the application

nodes.bodyText: I think the text I suggested in dapengzhang0's PR is still appropriate. When talking just about interceptors (as was the case with language like "gRPC will fail to notify the application"), then this isn't the correct spot for it.
